Html:
Hello,

I ´ve published a TightVNC package following the guide in this web.

From the side of the client computer, the update is found but when is installing it I get the error:

Code 57E

I don´t get this error with an Adobe Reader XI package.

It would be aprecciated your help.
This error code is specifique to the MSI file. You should ask the editor of TightVNC what does it mean.
